Package com.vs.starnet.star.controller

Class StarController

java.lang.Object
com.vs.starnet.star.controller.StarController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/vs/v1/system") public class StarController extends Object
Controller for handling component registration and interactions with SOL.

    • updateComponent

    • getComponentStatus

      @GetMapping({"/{comUuid}","/"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> getComponentStatus(@PathVariable(required=false) String comUuid, @RequestParam String star)
      Handle GET request for checking component status.
      Parameters:
      comUuid - the UUID of the component to check
      star - the STAR-UUID of the star system
      Returns:
      the component status or an error response
